FMVector3List cvs

Detailed Description

Represents a generic spline.

A FCSpline contains a list of control vertices and a closed attribute which defaults to false.

Member Function Documentation

virtual FCDSpline* FCDSpline::Clone (  FCDSpline *  clone  )  const [virtual]
 

[INTERNAL] Copies the spline into a clone.

The clone may reside in another document.

Parameters:

[INTERNAL] Reads in the <spline> element from a given COLLADA XML tree node.

Parameters:

Returns:
The status of the import. If the status is 'false', it may be dangerous to extract information from the spline.

virtual xmlNode* FCDSpline::WriteToXML (  xmlNode *  parentNode,
const fm::string &  parentId,
const fm::string &  splineId
)  const [virtual]
 

[INTERNAL] Writes out the <spline> element to the given COLLADA XML tree node.

The sources in this spline will have an ID built this way : "parentId ID splineId".

Parameters:
parentId The parent's ID string.
parentNode The COLLADA XML parent node in which to insert the spline information.
splineId The spline's ID string.
Returns:
The created Linear XML tree node.

Reimplemented in FCDNURBSSpline.
